name: T-65 Arcade Combat Simulator for Quest 2
name_original: T-65 Arcade Combat Simulator for Quest 2
description:
Incom T-65 'X-Wing' Arcade Combat Simulator

Early Access Alpha for Meta Quest 2

Take control of an Incom T-65 X-Wing starfighter from your Quest 2.

Full VR X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter combat. Single player 8v8 Combat arena set within an asteroid field.  This is an UNFINSHED and ongoing project. This current build uses a stripped down and simplified control scheme,  the final version will have a full 'virtual HOTAS'.  This initial build is for testing and evaluation purposes only, there are no tutorials/instructions as yet and the game currently uses placement art for both the cockpit, instrumentation and all other assets. EVERYTHING will most likely change in subsequent releases. Current work and future releases will be centred around Online Multiplayer (Dog Fighting Duels / deathmatch, TDM, Matchmaking etc.)

  • Arcade style Instant Action
  • Full control over ship power management
  • Simple and Advanced 'virtual HOTAS' control schemes

Hope you enjoy this game, If you need any help or would like to contribute to the project, please consider joining the Discord server:  https://discord.gg/4gPAA4Nq or,  making a small donation to further support the project.

Thank you, may the force be with you.
